title: Visual Inheritance
body: To be able to inherit from a base usercontrol or page and be able to add to or alter the xaml from the base control, with the designer providing full support for this.

comments.body:
it is mentioned here
http://support2.microsoft.com/kb/957231
as "Currently deriving a XAML generated class from another XAML generated class is not supported."

Silverlight allows inheriting a UserControl that is based on XAML from another UserControl that is also based on XAML, but WPF doesn't and should be fixed to do so too (have the compiler and the designer respect the Content attribute)
